root.update_contents: <FlowDocument FontFamily="Microsoft YaHei UI" FontSize="14" LineHeight="14" PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="False" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"><Paragraph LineHeight="11.666666666666668"><Run FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="20" Background="#FFFF8000" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xml:space="preserve"> 更 新 日 志 </Run></Paragraph><Paragraph LineHeight="9.333333333333334"><Run FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="16" Background="#00FFFFFF" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User">【特点】</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph LineHeight="8.166666666666668"><Run Background="#00FFFFFF" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User">1. 支持显示多个提示信息，每个提示信息可单独设置参数。</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph LineHeight="8.166666666666668"><Run Background="#00FFFFFF" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User">2. 提示信息可置顶显示，不被其他窗口覆盖。</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph LineHeight="8.166666666666668"><Run Background="#00FFFFFF" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User">3. 支持开机自启动，开机后自动显示提示信息。</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph LineHeight="8.166666666666668"><Run Background="#00FFFFFF" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User">4. 支持多种字体样式和颜色设置，能实现较为丰富的显示效果。</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph LineHeight="8.166666666666668"><Run Background="#00FFFFFF" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User">更多功能开发中。。。</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>
